document_data.caption: A map showing Sulaziir in central Halruaa.
document_data.name: Sulaziir
document_data.mainbody: '''Sulaziir''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Sulaziir was located in central Halruaa. The town lay along the eastern shore of [[Lake Halruaa]] and the north bank of the [[River Maeru]] where the river joined the lake.
